feed.title: "A Transaction Fee Market Exists Without a Block Size Limit"--new research paper suggests

entry.title: "A Transaction Fee Market Exists Without a Block Size Limit"--new research paper suggests
entry.summary: The message on the bitcoin-dev mailing list warns researchers of the highly political and controversial nature of the blocksize limit issue. The author also cautions that some developers may lack the necessary knowledge or experience beyond their Bitcoin expertise, while others may be more interested in drama-laced posts on Reddit. The author then suggests that rants and attacks from individuals like Todd and Garzik should be posted on personal blogs or Reddit instead of the mailing list. Another member of the mailing list comments on the irony of this suggestion, calling it "the kettle calling the pot black." The message ends with contact information for Neil Fincham, MineForeman.
